thread.title: (P) Latest trends in economy and business at SMART MONEY Summit
thread.title_full: (P) Latest trends in economy and business at SMART MONEY Summit

author: Irina Chirileasa
title: (P) Latest trends in economy and business at SMART MONEY Summit
text:
With an organized and a unique concept, it’s theme being “Prepare for the future!”, the event will bring together managers, entrepreneurs and professionals with a broad experience in top Romanian institutions and companies from different domains, such as entrepreneurship, investment, real estate, business consulting and IT/Tech. The participants will witness to various up-to-date presentations on topics that stakeholders from the economics and finance departments deal with. The event is a good opportunity for the participants from different backgrounds to share their knowledge and their ideas that could contribute to the development of the economic ecosystem from Bucharest and Romania.
“From the beginning, 2015 was a constant challenge thanks to the business opportunities, legislative changes and geopolitical risks. My wish is that through this first edition to show the essential details of the latest trends in economy and business, but also “the big picture”. Thus, the conference wants to be not only a great opportunity to do quality networking but also to offer it’s participants insights from entrepreneurs, investors and business professionals. This event approach is top-down, the subjects being structured from macro to micro.” Said Țiff Cristian Alexandru, Project Manager of SMART MONEY Summit.
The presentations of the speakers will focus on the latest trends in economy:
1.Romanian business outlook: SMART MONEY Survey – Tudor Irimiea, President Invest Club / Managing Partner UBS Partners
2. International macroeconomic outlook. Geopolitical Risks – Radu Ciofu, Financial Analist, Admiral Markets
3. KeysFin analisys: The evolution of small business sector in Romania – Roxana Nica, Managing Director KeysFin
4.Preventing fraud and operational risks. RisCo app – Dragoș Cabat, Managing Partner RisCo
5. Exclusive listing, the new model of real estate consulting- Valentin Cismaru, Development Director RE/MAX România
6. Financing through AeRo. BSE perspectives – Bogdan Mugescu, Business Development Specialist Bucharest Stock Exchange
7. How to do effective networking for your business. Modern approaches – Bianca Tudor, Founder Elite Business Women / Managing Partner More Solutions
8. Alternative ways of financing: Venture Capital, Angel Investor, Accelerators – Florin Mureșan – CEO Squirrly LTD
9. Seed for Tech: Investment opportunities in tech startups. – Mircea Vădan, Investment Manager Seed for Tech
10. Investment clubs. Perspectives of capital market – Tudor Irimiea, President Invest Club / Managing Partner UBS Partners
SMART MONEY Summit 2015 , will take place on the 22 nd of October at Ramada Majestic Bucharest . The price of a ticket will be 55€ if you buy an early bird and 75€ if you buy a ticket closer to the date of the event. The conference is dedicated to entrepreneurs, investors, managers, brokers and specialists from different domains.
The event is organized with the support of sponsors and partners: KeysFin, Admiral Markets, RisCo, Bucharest Stock Exchange, RE/MAX Romania, Elite Business Women, Seed for Tech, Squirrly LTD, Invest Club, București văzut de sus, Napoca Business, Delegato, Microjoburi.ro and UBS Partners.
The conference is moderated by Tudor Irimiea and has the support of the following media partners: Romania-Insider.com, Doingbusiness.ro, Jurnalul de Afaceri, Business24, Profit.ro, Forbes, Techsylvania, EconomiaOnline.ro, bizz.club, startups.ro, Romania Pozitivă, Luca Dezmir, Daniel Ses, Garajul de PR, Olivian.ro, PRwave, Revista Bulevard, inOras.ro, Communicate de Afaceri, ASER, Iași4u, Promo Afaceri, Great News, Business Ladies Club, Stepanadrian.ro, Fara Contabilitate, ASCIG, Mugur Frunzetti, Orasulm.eu, AMCOR, Cluj Startups, nemutam.com and Alexandra Denisa Neagoe.
*The official language of the event is Romanian.
More details available on http://www.smartmoneysummit.ro/ or contact@evenimentebiz.ro.
(p) – this article is an advertorial
